alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:10AM EDT until June 15 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 115 AM EDT/1215 AM CDT/. * At 1210 AM EDT/1110 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Marianna to 13 miles northwest of Blountstown to 8 miles north of Lynn Haven, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Blountstown, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Orange, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Abe Springs, Chipola, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Quincy Airport, Lowry and Hugh Creek. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
